Content: Renovations to 30 tanks in the Vavuniya District have been completed. 150 million rupees has been spent to renovate the tanks. Vavuniya South Divisional Secretary M.S. Jaanaka said that all paddy fields in the area have been cultivated during the Maha season. Vavuniya South Divisional Secretary M.S. Jaanaka said that many irrigation canals have been repaired in the area and more paddy fields have been cultivated. He said that they expect a better harvest this year exceeding their expectations.
